mapper.update:
update edu_practice
YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLASSES = #{classes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENT_NAME = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEAD_TEACHER = #{headTeacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT = #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PRACTICE_NUM = #{practiceNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OBJECTION = #{objection,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
APPROVAL = #{approval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTACHMENT_ID = #{attachmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTACHMENT_NAME = #{attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PRACTICE_ID = #{practiceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
